label: Tether Recommendations
matchedOn: Diagnosis, treatment phase, energy patterns, interaction style, past interests

recommendations.name: Blue Ridge Hiking Club - Beginner Group
recommendations.description: Weekly beginner-friendly hikes on local trails. No experience needed. Groups of 6-10 people.
recommendations.location: Meets at Mill Mountain trailhead, 3.2 miles away

matchRationale.summary: This group leverages Marcus's past interest in hiking while providing a low-pressure social environment.
factors: Morning time slot aligns with his energy pattern
Small group size (6-10) is manageable but not isolating

recommendations.name: CBT Skills Group at Valley Behavioral Health
recommendations.description: 8-week structured group focused on cognitive behavioral skills for depression. Led by licensed therapist.

matchRationale.summary: This clinical resource provides structure and skill-building during morning hours when Marcus has more energy.
factors: Morning slot matches peak energy time
Small group of 6 reduces social overwhelm

recommendations.name: NAMI Peer-to-Peer Course
recommendations.description: Free 8-session educational program about mental health recovery, taught by trained peers who have lived experience.
recommendations.location: Community Center, 789 Main St, 1.8 miles away
recommendations.intake: Registration required, next session starts in 2 weeks

matchRationale.summary: This psychoeducation course offers connection with others who understand depression, with lower pressure than a traditional support group.
factors: Morning time slot aligns with energy pattern
Educational format is less emotionally intense than process groups
Peer-led by people with lived experience
Free, removing cost as a barrier
